name: Gummies Nummies
description: Gummy Nummies is a 2D side scrolling collectathon where you play as a cute, small gumbian named Leon. Travel around the the land collecting the most delicious treat anyone has ever tasted. Gummies! But be careful as their are other out there that also wish to have these Gummies to themselves! Do you have have what it take to get all the Gummies!
